content:
I think I'll follow your advice and introduce Azul first, and then Codenames later on. That way, my neighbor can get a feel for strategic gameplay with Azul and then have fun with the word-guessing aspect of Codenames.

By the way, I've been thinking about hosting a game night at my place soon, and I was wondering if you had any suggestions for games that would be suitable for a group of 6-8 people?
